column5: Our budget-oriented, sociable accommodation where guest rent a bed with a shared living room, full kitchen, and 2 large bathrooms with showers and a private entrance to your room. It comfortably sleep two just a 1/2 block from Main Street and our 70 acre City Park and Medina River. Enjoy coffee in your room or outside on the picnic table. This room now has it own private flatscreen TV.
column8: Room #7 with queen bed, sink, and vanity/stool/TV
